# Workflows

Reusable workflows.

- [Pre-checks](./pre-checks.yml): Preliminary checks to code.
    - `python-version` : python version to use. Defaults to `3.9`
    - `os`: os to use. Defaults to `ubuntu-latest`

- [Tests](./tests.yml): Run tests on a matrix of Python version
    - `os`: os to use. Defaults to `ubuntu-latest`
